languages.text: {n}Мейв, настоящая Мейв, поднимает на вас слезящиеся глаза.{/n} "Снова я... Это было так... Так..." {n}Сил на что-то кроме этих слов у девушки не хватает. Ее тело оседает на пол.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Придя в себя, вы понимаете, что вместе с вами этот приступ боли разделили еще трое: проктор, палач и Лидзи. И у каждого на шее горят, обжигая кожу, одинаковые кулоны с тассерцием. Соломон незаметно подает вам знак: пора действовать.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive, the real Maive, looks at you through watering eyes.{/n} "Myself again... It was so... so..." {n}She lacks the strength for anything more, and her body collapses to the ground.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мейв, настоящая Мейв, поднимает на вас слезящиеся глаза.{/n} "Снова я... Это было так... Так..." {n}Сил на что-то кроме этих слов у девушки не хватает. Ее тело оседает на пол.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive, the real Maive, struggles to look at you with bleary eyes.{/n} "Myself again... It was so... So..." {n}Maive has no strength for anything other than those words. Her body collapses to the ground.{/n}

{n}Maive, the real Maive, struggles to look at you with bleary eyes.{/n} "Myself again... It was so... So..." {n}Maive has no strength for anything other than those words. Her body collapses to the ground.{/n}
{n}Maive, the real Maive, squints at you through bleary eyes.{/n} "Myself again... It was so... so..." {n}She lacks the strength for anything more, and her body collapses to the ground.{/n}
{n}Maive, the real Maive, squints at you through bleary eyes.{/n} "Myself again... It was so... so..." {n}She lacks the strength for anything more, and her body collapses to the ground.{/n}
{n}Maive, the real Maive, looks at you through watering eyes.{/n} "Myself again... It was so... so..." {n}She lacks the strength for anything more, and her body collapses to the ground.{/n}
{n}Maive, the real Maive, looks at you through watering eyes.{/n} "Myself again... It was so... so..." {n}She lacks the strength for anything more, and her body collapses to the ground.{/n}

languages.text: {n}而梅芙，真正的梅芙，正眼泪汪汪地看着你。{/n}“我终于回来了……这实在是……实在是……”{n}她失去了所有力量，倒在了地上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive, the real Maive, looks at you through watering eyes.{/n} "Myself again... It was so... so..." {n}She lacks the strength for anything more, and her body collapses to the ground.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}而梅芙，真正的梅芙，正眼泪汪汪地看着你。{/n}“我终于回来了……这实在是……实在是……”{n}她失去了所有力量，倒在了地上。{/n}

languages.text: {n}本物のメイヴが、涙ぐんだ目であなたを見つめている。{/n}「戻った…とても…とても…」{n}彼女はそれ以上言葉を紡ぐ力も残っておらず、そのまま地面に崩れ落ちた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive, the real Maive, looks at you through watering eyes.{/n} "Myself again... It was so... so..." {n}She lacks the strength for anything more, and her body collapses to the ground.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}本物のメイヴが、涙ぐんだ目であなたを見つめている。{/n}「戻った…とても…とても…」{n}彼女はそれ以上言葉を紡ぐ力も残っておらず、そのまま地面に崩れ落ちた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive, la auténtica Maive, te mira con lágrimas en los ojos.{/n} «Soy yo misma otra vez... Ha sido tan... tan...». {n}Le fallan las fuerzas y su cuerpo se desploma en el suelo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive, the real Maive, looks at you through watering eyes.{/n} "Myself again... It was so... so..." {n}She lacks the strength for anything more, and her body collapses to the ground.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive, la auténtica Maive, te mira con lágrimas en los ojos.{/n} «Soy yo misma otra vez... Ha sido tan... tan...». {n}Le fallan las fuerzas y su cuerpo se desploma en el suelo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gerçek Maive, yaşlı gözlerle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Tekrar kendim oldum... Bu... Çok..." {n}Sözlerini devam ettirecek gücü kalmamış bedeni yere yığılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive, the real Maive, looks at you through watering eyes.{/n} "Myself again... It was so... so..." {n}She lacks the strength for anything more, and her body collapses to the ground.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gerçek Maive, yaşlı gözlerle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Tekrar kendim oldum... Bu... Çok..." {n}Sözlerini devam ettirecek gücü kalmamış bedeni yere yığılıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La véritable Maive vous regarde les larmes aux yeux.{/n} « Je suis de nouveau moi-même... C'était si... si... » {n}La force lui manque pour achever sa phrase et elle s'effondre au sol.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive, the real Maive, looks at you through watering eyes.{/n} "Myself again... It was so... so..." {n}She lacks the strength for anything more, and her body collapses to the ground.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La véritable Maive vous regarde les larmes aux yeux.{/n} « Je suis de nouveau moi-même... C'était si... si... » {n}La force lui manque pour achever sa phrase et elle s'effondre au sol.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive, die echte Maive, sieht dich mit feuchten Augen an.{/n} "Ich bin wieder ich selbst ... Es war so ... so ..." {n}Für mehr fehlt ihr die Kraft und sie bricht zusammen.{/n}
